PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-02092010-02-23,  ,  HEALTH,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1587 - Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1587 - Food Additives) in order to enable the use of sodium hexametaphosphate, a food additive currently listed in the Tables to section B.16.100, as a sequestering agent in liquid whey during the evaporation process.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0040 Publication Date: 2010-03-17
AttachmentsAttachment
